donor_name:
UNITED NATIONS EDUCATIONAL, SCIENTIFIC &
CULTURAL ORGANIZAITON
outputs.output_descr: This project seeks to strengthen institutional capacities and enhance public awareness and education programmes for tsunamis and other coastal hazards through support to the Caribbean Tsunami Information Centre (CTIC).

project_descr: This project seeks to strengthen institutional capacities and enhance public awareness and education programmes for tsunamis and other coastal hazards through support to the Caribbean Tsunami Information Centre (CTIC).
